title: 2 Quick Ways to Insert a Table in a Microsoft Word Document

steps.title: Click Insert.
steps.content: Click Insert . This is the tab in the top toolbar of Microsoft Word . [1] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source If your cursor isn't already placed where you want the table, click the location now.

steps.title: Click Table.
steps.content: Click Table . You can find this in the Tables section. A drop-down menu will open.

steps.title: Select a table size.
steps.content: Select a table size. Hover your cursor over the squares to create the dimensions you want. You should see the squares turn orange when selected. On Mac, the squares will turn blue. On Word online, the squares will turn grey.

steps.title: Click to create the table.
steps.content: Click to create the table. The table will be created in the designated area. If you want to create a table bigger than 10x8, click Insert tableâ€¦ in the drop-down menu instead. On Word online, this will look like Choose row and column . Enter the number of columns and rows. Optional for Windows and Mac: adjust the AutoFit behavior. Click OK to add the table. You can also add graphs , a file , and images .

steps.title: Tap the edit icon.
steps.content: Tap the edit icon. This looks like a pencil in front of an A . You can find it in the top-right corner. A pop-up menu will open. If your cursor isn't already placed where you want the table, tap the location now.

steps.title: Tap Home.
steps.content: Tap Home . This is the tab in the pop-up menu. More options will show.

steps.title: Tap Insert.
steps.content: Tap Insert . You can find this below Home .

steps.title: Tap Table.
steps.content: Tap Table . A table will be added automatically to your document.

steps.title: Add more columns or rows (optional).
steps.content: Add more columns or rows (optional). If the default table isn't big enough, you can easily insert more boxes. Make sure you're still on the Table tab, and then do the following: Tap Insert . To add more rows, tap Insert Above or Insert Below . To add more columns, tap Insert Left or Insert Right . To delete a column or row, tap it. Tap Delete , and then tap Delete Columns or Delete Rows .
